item.description:
The next Skeptics in the Cafe will be at Cafe Zog! Cafe Zog is just a few doors down from Coffee Exchange, and is a lot quieter, and also has a patio in the back where we can sit if the weather allows.

I will have a laptop opened with the RI Skeptics Facebook logo displayed on it.

Skeptics in the Cafe meets twice a month - one on a Thursday evening and one on Sunday afternoon. It won't always be at the same coffee shop - at least at first, but I'd like to keep it all loose and open to suggestion.

Cafe Zog IS HERE

239 Wickenden St
Providence, RI 02903-4328

Our Facebook page can be found here
item.how_to_find_us: I will have a laptop opened with the RI Skeptics Facebook logo displayed on it.
item.name: Skeptics in the Cafe
